sqlMap.insert:
SELECT nextval('tbl_access_access_id_seq') as id;
insert into tbl_proxy_hits ( mem_org_unit_id, sup_org_unit_id, year, month, day_of_month, day_of_week, hour, count, last_changed, ) values ( #orgId#, date_trunc('milliseconds', now()));
sqlMap.select:
select
hits.mem_org_unit_id as org_id
hits.sup_org_unit_id as org_id
name.name as org_name,
hits.hour as period
hits.day_of_week as period
hits.day_of_month as period
hits.month as period
sum(hits.count) as sum from tbl_proxy_hits as hits
left outer join tbl_org_unit as org on org.org_unit_id = hits.mem_org_unit_id
left outer join tbl_org_unit as org on org.org_unit_id = hits.sup_org_unit_id
left outer join tbl_org_unit_name as name on org.org_unit_id = name.org_unit_id where year || month || day_of_month || hour >= #from# and year || month || day_of_month || hour <= #to#
and name.language_code = 'no' and name.category = 'NORMAL'
and name.language_code = 'en' and name.category = 'NORMAL'
hits.mem_org_unit_id = #memberId#
hits.sup_org_unit_id = #supplierId#
group by org_id, org_name, period order by org_id desc, org_name, period asc ;
